src.sql:
select au.UserId as AspNetId ,u.UserID, u.Username, u.Email, u.FirstName, u.LastName
from  aspnet_Users au 
inner join users u on au.UserName=u.Username 
inner join aspnet_Applications app on au.ApplicationId=app.ApplicationId 
inner join UserPortals up on u.UserID=up.UserId 
where app.ApplicationName='DotNetNuke' 
and up.PortalId=[TknParams:PortalId]
and up.IsDeleted=0 
and u.userid= [TknParams:UserId]
src.columns:
AspNetId
UserID
Username
Email
FirstName
LastName
